title: Unable to download-patch league

embed.description: Pro-Tip: Bookmark This. Updated 11.11.15 If none of these solutions worked for you, please don't hesitate to post your issue in the Help & Support Boards, either as a new thread or in the Patching Issues thread for the corresponding patch. Preface In troubleshooting patching issu

body:
It all started with patch 7.6 . When I first tried  to update league to patch 7.16 I kept getting this error where it would download the patch properly until a certain point, then the middle top part of the league window would stop showing the MBs left to download and the download speed and it would say 
"0 files scanned". Despite this, the part of the percentage downloaded would continue to rise up to 99% where it would show an error saying "Unspecified Error has occurred". After trying to patch it several times I decided to reinstall league. Now it will download until the 33% checkpoint. Then after 70%-80% the exact same problem as with the initial patching will occur. I have tried a lot of ways to fix this through league support pages but the problem doesn't seem to fix ( link of a support page example is in the link box ) and o have tried reinstalling several times. I need further advice on how to solve this as it has frustrated me a lot and i would like to play league on the following weekend.
Thanx for your time!

replies.body: Some of that content is old and may no longer be relevant.  After 33%, your patcher is done scanning game files and needs to connect to the patching server to download updates.  Something with your network is blocking that from happening.  If you've already gone through the connection support article, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help.  Grab some logs to attach to the ticket for more context through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
sorry to bother you again but i am not familiar with that sort of thing, can you please explain that 'log' thing

Sure thing!  First step, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  

When you open it up, you'll see "Gather System & LoL Logs" under the General section.

That will yield a folder with logs, which you'll be able to attach to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).   

Let me know if that helps!
